event.description: Alex Gordon lines out to right fielder Max Kepler.
Mike Moustakas lines out to center fielder Byron Buxton.
Lorenzo Cain walks.
Eric Hosmer flies out to left fielder Eddie Rosario.
Salvador Perez singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Eddie Rosario.
Brandon Moss grounds into a double play, shortstop Jorge Polanco to second baseman Brian Dozier to first baseman Joe Mauer. Salvador Perez out at 2nd.
Paulo Orlando grounds out, third baseman Miguel Sano to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Alcides Escobar pops out to second baseman Brian Dozier.
Raul Mondesi bunt grounds out softly, second baseman Brian Dozier to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Alex Gordon lines out sharply to center fielder Byron Buxton.
Mike Moustakas homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Lorenzo Cain grounds out, third baseman Miguel Sano to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Eric Hosmer pops out to third baseman Miguel Sano in foul territory.
Salvador Perez pops out to third baseman Miguel Sano.
Brandon Moss grounds out softly to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Paulo Orlando flies out to center fielder Byron Buxton.
Alcides Escobar flies out to right fielder Max Kepler.
Raul Mondesi grounds out, second baseman Brian Dozier to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Alex Gordon pops out to first baseman Joe Mauer in foul territory.
Mike Moustakas grounds out, second baseman Brian Dozier to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Lorenzo Cain walks.
Eric Hosmer strikes out swinging. Lorenzo Cain steals (1) 2nd base.
Salvador Perez strikes out swinging.
Brandon Moss strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Matt Belisle replaces Ervin Santana.
Paulo Orlando lines out to second baseman Brian Dozier.
Alcides Escobar strikes out swinging.
Raul Mondesi grounds out softly, first baseman Joe Mauer to pitcher Matt Belisle.
Pitching Change: Brandon Kintzler replaces Matt Belisle.
Alex Gordon singles on a ground ball to third baseman Miguel Sano.
Mike Moustakas grounds into a double play, second baseman Brian Dozier to shortstop Jorge Polanco to first baseman Joe Mauer. Alex Gordon out at 2nd.
Lorenzo Cain grounds out, shortstop Jorge Polanco to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Brian Dozier grounds out softly, pitcher Danny Duffy to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Robbie Grossman strikes out swinging.
Byron Buxton strikes out swinging.
Joe Mauer flies out to left fielder Alex Gordon in foul territory.
Miguel Sano pops out sharply to second baseman Raul Mondesi.
Jason Castro singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Alex Gordon.
Jorge Polanco walks. Jason Castro to 2nd.
Max Kepler strikes out swinging.
Eddie Rosario singles on a ground ball to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Brian Dozier flies out to right fielder Paulo Orlando.
Robbie Grossman strikes out swinging.
Byron Buxton lines out to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Joe Mauer lines out to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Miguel Sano homers (1) on a line drive to left center field.
Jason Castro walks.
Jorge Polanco pops out to first baseman Eric Hosmer in foul territory.
Max Kepler flies out to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Eddie Rosario strikes out swinging.
Brian Dozier flies out sharply to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Robbie Grossman walks.
Byron Buxton strikes out swinging.
Joe Mauer strikes out swinging.
Miguel Sano pops out to second baseman Raul Mondesi.
Jason Castro called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Matt Strahm replaces Danny Duffy.
Jorge Polanco singles on a soft line drive to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Twins challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was overturned: Max Kepler singles on a bunt ground ball to pitcher Matt Strahm. Jorge Polanco to 2nd.
Eddie Rosario out on a sacrifice bunt, third baseman Mike Moustakas to second baseman Raul Mondesi. Jorge Polanco to 3rd. Max Kepler to 2nd.
Matt Strahm intentionally walks Brian Dozier.
Robbie Grossman walks. Jorge Polanco scores. Max Kepler to 3rd. Brian Dozier to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Peter Moylan replaces Matt Strahm.
Byron Buxton strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Travis Wood replaces Peter Moylan.
Joe Mauer walks. Max Kepler scores. Brian Dozier to 3rd. Robbie Grossman to 2nd.
Miguel Sano walks. Brian Dozier scores. Robbie Grossman to 3rd. Joe Mauer to 2nd.
Jason Castro singles on a line drive to left fielder Alex Gordon. Robbie Grossman scores. Joe Mauer scores. Miguel Sano to 3rd on the throw.
Jorge Polanco singles on a ground ball to right fielder Paulo Orlando. Miguel Sano scores. Jason Castro to 2nd.
Max Kepler strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Mike Minor replaces Travis Wood.
Eddie Rosario grounds out, shortstop Alcides Escobar to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Brian Dozier singles on a ground ball to second baseman Raul Mondesi, deflected by pitcher Mike Minor.
Robbie Grossman strikes out swinging.
Byron Buxton pops out to catcher Salvador Perez in foul territory.
